name: 葛瑞斐
objective: Through class discussion and group presentations, this course will help develop students’ English conversation skills.
schedule:
1: Introduction
2-5: Personal Narrative: A Story of Anger, Jealousy, or Fear
6-8: Super powers: If I could . . . I would
9: Midterm
10-12: News Story: Q&A
13-15: Photographs
16-17: Film and discussion
scorePolicy:
Midterm: 33.3%
Final: 33.3%
Participation: 33.3%
Attendance: a combination of 5 absences or late days =  -10 points from course grade
materials: Grading for midterm and final projects on will be based on criteria such as clarity, fluency, originality, and effort.
